content:
In Kherson's suburbs, the number of wounded as a result of morning shelling increased by Russian invaders to three.

About thisreportThere is the Kherson Regional Military Administration.

“Three civilians were hosted on the road between Antonivka and Sadov. These are men, 21, 44 and 27, ”the message reads.

As it is noted, all three people have mild injuries.

After providing medical care, they will undergo outpatient treatment.

As ArmyInform reported, over the past daywas fired10 regions of Ukraine.
title: Near Kherson, three people were hit by Russian fire
description: The Kherson Regional Military Administration reports. “Under enemy shelling on ...
author: Army Inform
